description: Richard Griffiths Architects is a multi-award winning practice specializing in the Heritage Conservation of old buildings and new build within an historic context.  The practice is opening the office to people who are interested to learn more about our work and projects.  There will be also presentations from specialists in the field of conservation throughout the day.

events.name: Drop in: Open Day in conjunction with the Art Workers Guild

factsheet.heading: Richard Griffiths Architects at Work
paragraphs: Richard Griffiths Architects has been at the forefront of the conservation of historic buildings for over 40 years. At our Bloomsbury offices, visitors will be able to view examples of our work, models of buildings and hand drawn designs.  RGA's team of architects will be on hand to answer questions about our projects and give an insight into the restoration of some of the country's most iconic buildings, such at the Grand Midland Hotel, St Pancras, Lambeth Palace and Southwark Cathedral.

name: Architect's Studio - Richard Griffiths Architects
